I really enjoyed my stay at Apollo Hotel. I was here for the second time.
The rooms are fine but could be a little more modern. Also the room service did not change the sheets and put my used glasses away.
Other than that Apollo offers everything you need and the breakfast was great.

Ok‚Ä¶trying to be as fair as possible: extra bed for the third person in the room is very expensive at 25 euros/night when they can‚Äôt explain why the ‚Äúthree person rooms‚Äù are not being offered or what the difference is. A bit of a ripoff. The parking is also very expensive at 18 euros/day/car and no discount is given unless a 10 day plus stay when there is street parking much cheaper but not mentioned. The biggest problem is dogs. People lock their animals inside to go to the party and they bark all night long. Once a dog knows there is another dog across the hall they will bark at each other. Then they bring then at the breakfast room with the people. Some dogs poop. I don‚Äôt think they should be allowed there and I love dogs. I went to the desk twice for a dog barking from the next room but nothing happened. You pay to get some rest but it wasn‚Äôt the case. Unfortunately because of this I will not be coming back soon. Otherwise friendly staff, clean rooms, good and varied breakfast, good restaurant food, some with decent prices.

Rooms were quite affordable,Friendly and very respectful staff, very peaceful,safe and accommodating environment.meals were super,different types of delicious foods,Apollo hotel Bratislava,is simply home away from home. I will sure come back again and again. It was worth every penny spent üíØ

The customer service from all the staff on front desk, cleaners and waiters was excellent. Yacob was an excellent staff member in particular who took is to the Sauna and Cave room. Very throughout and helpful. The rooms and beds were large and comfortable. The restaurant was beautiful old school. Breakfast was really fancy and the dinners were fine dining, delicious at good prices and excellent service. We really enjoyed everything about this hotel and it made our stay in Bratislava wonderful. Thankyou for the upgrade to with free mini bar.

Nice hotel close to Bratislava old town (aprox. 20min walk), nice, comfy room... Only balcony is missing..delicious breakfast - every day something new, especially cake selections is great, coffee - not that great...overall we had nice stay
